trans-unit.source: Contains information, such as the row and column indexes, about a specific coordinate pair in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações, como índices de linha e coluna, sobre um par de coordenadas específicas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTest%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTest%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> classe retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método para determinar qual parte do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle está localizado em coordenadas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call this method specifying the coordinates of a mouse click to determine the row and column indexes of the clicked cell or whether a header cell or scroll bar was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar esse método especificando as coordenadas do mouse, clique em para determinar os índices de linha e coluna da célula clicada ou se uma barra de rolagem ou célula de cabeçalho foi clicada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> tópico de referência de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the column that contains the coordinates described by the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da coluna que contém as coordenadas descritas pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the coordinates described by the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que contém as coordenadas descritas pelo atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate of the beginning of the column that contains the coordinates described by the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada X do início da coluna que contém as coordenadas descritas pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the coordinates described by the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x da coluna no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que contém as coordenadas descritas pelo atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser comparado com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> especificado é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> in which the values of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.Type" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.RowIndex" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.ColumnIndex" /> properties are the same as the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="value" /> for um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> no qual os valores das propriedades <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.Type" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.RowIndex" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.ColumnIndex" /> são as mesmas do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: Serve como uma função de hash para um tipo específico.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash do <see cref="T:System.Object" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the point is not on a cell or cell header.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o ponto não está em uma célula ou um cabeçalho de célula.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTest%2A> method returns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.Nowhere> when the specified point is at an empty area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTest%2A> método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.Nowhere> quando o ponto especificado está em uma área vazia do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row that contains the coordinates described by the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da linha que contém as coordenadas descritas pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the coordinates described by the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que contém as coordenadas descritas pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-coordinate of the top of the row that contains the coordinates described by the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada Y da parte superior da linha que contém as coordenadas descritas pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the coordinates described by the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y da linha de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que contém as coordenadas descritas pelo atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que representa um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.ColumnIndex%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.RowIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.ToString%2A> método retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.ColumnIndex%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.RowIndex%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHitTestType" /> that indicates which part of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> the coordinates described by the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> belong to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHitTestType" /> que indica a qual parte do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> as coordenadas descritas pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> atual pertencem.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHitTestType" /> value that indicates the control part at the coordinates described by the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHitTestType" /> valor que indica a parte do controle, nas coordenadas descrito pelo atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />.
